website_summaries.verdict: An adorable little octopus-shaped nightlight that can project stars, bubbles, and fish.
pros: Features an auto-shutoff timer and is small enough to fit on a bedside table
It produces stars and sea-themed shapes in blue and green and is lightweight enough for travel
cons: Some found the light too bright

customer_reviews.title: Cute nightlight but very bright
customer_reviews.text: It's really very cute and my 2 year old son LOVED it! However, I purchased this to give him something soothing to play with while he tried to put himself to sleep. In the end I think the light is just way too bright, so I had to return it and get something different.
customer_reviews.author: liamsmommy

customer_reviews.title: Cloud B Twinkles To Go Octo Nightlight
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my most favorite gifts for a little boy. The kids love it and so do the parents. Some have never seen this item before and are thrilled to receive it as a gift. My nephew stands in his crib until his mom turns on the light for him. It is also nice that it has both a blue & green light projection. I would highly recommend if you need a baby or toddler gift for a little boy. I have also purchased a similar product for girls - the projected colors are pink and orange. Just a very cool gift! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: TheSailorGirl

customer_reviews.title: GREAT choice. My son loves this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this blindly based on reviews from Amazon. GREAT choice. My son loves this, and at 8 months, still does. It's a great first night light, and promotes relaxation and curiosity in a baby esp. during pre-bed feedings. He had it from week one, and I'm so glad about this purchase. You are getting a great deal with this!!! Highly, highly, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Cute star projector.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a travel nightlight for my son. Compact enough to throw in an overnight bag and small enough to fit anywhere next to the bed. It runs on batteries and we've had it for awhile and still haven't needed to change them. My son likes the stars projected onto the ceiling and sometimes just plays with it because hey, it's cute. Fast shipping from the seller, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Oh

customer_reviews.title: Great price as well
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use as a night light in our nursery but it has many uses. My 18 month old is absolutely infatuated with this little light ever since we purchased it about a year ago. It is small enough to take with when traveling and the different color settings can put off just the right amount of light when needed. It definitely serves its purpose and more! Great price as well!
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the little jet setter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to use while traveling. My kid loves the changing colors (from blue, green & red) and projects fish and bubbles in addition to some stars which I think he finds slightly more interesting. We came back from our trip and continue to use it at home. It shuts off after about 45 minutes. Battery life isnt the best.. we use it nightly and have to change the battery about once a month.
customer_reviews.author: EF

customer_reviews.title: Bright in Blue, Dim in Red and Green
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love our Octo Nightlight! I bought it for my newborn, and used it for our own nightlight when the baby was in our room in the bassinet. It's great for all ages. Some of the reviews are saying it's too bright, but I personally think it is bright enough in the blue to serve as a night light, and dim enough in the red and green options that it can be a soothing light for sleep. Easy button turn-on and has automatic shut-off so batteries last a little longer. I plan to buy additional ones later on for gifts for other kids.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this nightlight. It has an auto shut off and great colored lights. I love the blue color lights. We've had it since he was a newborn and he still loves it. It helps him calm down right before bedtime and he's always intrigued by the shapes projected on the ceiling and walls. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sha

customer_reviews.title: I am not a baby but I want one for myself!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo beautiful. I am a new grandmom of two new grandbabies so I got the pink and the blue. The stars project on the wall and the light is a perfect brightness. I will post back after xmas and let you know how the babies reacted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic nightlight
customer_reviews.text: We love this light - just enough to change a diaper and feed, but not enough to fully wake the baby. Best of all, it's portable, so we take it to the bathroom and back for diaper changes, and have even taken it on travel.
customer_reviews.author: Science Geek

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Some might complain that it has no ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Some might complain that it has no cord and can only be battery operated, but it actually works out better in case you want to move it around the room (or from room to room which is very helpful if you have two with different bedtimes).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love it - perfect for toddlers and travel.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this. We have the bigger ladybug model, but it takes up a fair amount of space. Love the size of this one and that it can rotate the colors. Would definitely recommend to friends with toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: KatyF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute little nightlight. Can change the color of theblight, there re 3 options.
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: Works really well.
customer_reviews.text: This is great and has helped quell worries about bedtime. Options for solid versus rotating colors are good/fun. Like that it goes off automatically and is easily turned on.
customer_reviews.author: BellaGood

customer_reviews.title: this is a great little travel light
customer_reviews.text: The battery dies a bit too quickly. It seems I'm changing them every 6 weeks or so. We only use it at bedtime. Otherwise, this is a great little travel light.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jaques

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 6 mo. grandchild. The parents love this and no way of knowing what a baby thinks of a nightlight.
customer_reviews.author: Bamaguy

customer_reviews.title: this is perfect! very nice product with a good value that ...
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect! very nice product with a good value that is simple to use and doesn't take a lot of space. I would just add maybe 2 simple white noise options and will kill the competitors!
customer_reviews.author: Yore

customer_reviews.title: Stars with an auto-timer!
customer_reviews.text: It's the only thing out there that has stars and an auto timer. Only had to change the batteries once in about 2 months, when used every night. My 4 year old son loves it! Other products I looked at seemed to have safety/quality issues and seemed too bright, according to reviews.
customer_reviews.author: jkha

customer_reviews.title: Cloud B Twinkles Octo
customer_reviews.text: This is the third octopus I've bought. This lights up for 45 minutes, has two different colors, can light up a room with a glow, shines stars on the ceiling, is portable. LOVE IT! Great gift too.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Our little one loves it! But batteries run out in 2 months. Wish it would also plug in. However the size is perfect for travel which we do a lot of. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: JanetteL

customer_reviews.title: Held up better than the more expensive
customer_reviews.text: my girls use this now instead of sleeping with lamp on. Held up better than the more expensive ones
customer_reviews.author: Helen Pansch

customer_reviews.title: Happy light
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! If baby is fussy at night I can turn it on and she will stare at the stars. I love to make them change colors from blue to green which is an automatic setting. Great light
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: So cute; best for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. It has 3 color options (blue, red, and green) and you can set it to fade from one color to the next. It's more appropriate for smaller rooms.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Happy with
customer_reviews.text: Works well, coud have used more holes for light to pass thru especially where the piece comes together.Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: rtb

customer_reviews.title: Nightlight
customer_reviews.text: This has now been handed down to the 3 kid. Product works great and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice long timer too
customer_reviews.text: My 20 month old loves this octopus. I wish the light bulb inside rotated or something for some movement, but for the price it is a bargain. Toddler really loves looking at the stars and fish as she falls asleep. Nice long timer too.
customer_reviews.author: J.F.

customer_reviews.title: Cute little Nightlight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Nightlight for my grandson. He seems to like it. I like the different color options. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Levy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just as described. Projector works better than dreamlites, which my boys also have. Batteries last and shuts off hater 45 minutes. Press the on/off button twice on back so it can change colors (blue to green).
customer_reviews.author: rosalie mangual

customer_reviews.title: projects perfect!
customer_reviews.text: this is just the night light we were looking for! it has a large display area and the two colors are displayed great.
customer_reviews.author: jdogg

customer_reviews.title: Fun for nighttime
customer_reviews.text: Love the lights and changing colors! Also nice that it turns off on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rial

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This made the cutest addition to our new nursery! Would highly recommend. Not too bright so it won't disturb sleep.
customer_reviews.author: KLaw22

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fun night light
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! It's very cool to watch as you go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that this one alternates colors. Wish we had gotten this one first over the turtle version.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old loves the stars on the wall. He even insisted we get one for his new cousin so they could have pretty stars on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Widener

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely darling! Couldn't have been happier to give as a shower gift. This will become a go-to gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kristinaki

customer_reviews.title: Made bedtime so much easier
customer_reviews.text: This light was just the thing to make my sons transition to bed time much easier. After the story is read, we are actually able to leave his room without a fuss. He enjoys watching the colors slowly change, which do so while the position of the sealife seem to move around. The light sits on a small table next to his bed and the convenience of auto shut off is more than enough time for my son to fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Orlymaxmom

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this little octopus. He is so ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this little octopus. He is so excited to see the stars and fish all over his room. He also loves when the colors change.
customer_reviews.author: X. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little night lamp! The starfish and fish on the ceiling are adorable and it provides just enough light for nighttime diaper changes. In fact I may have to buy one for our bedroom, it's just too cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works well...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute nightlight that provides just the right amount of light. My son loves the little stars and fish that it projects. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Norcross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked no problem and is neat to look at in the dark nursery :)
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute product. My kids love the stars. It's great for travel too. We purchased it to take to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: The Handy Housewife

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The most ridiculous thing that I'm thrilled I bought. It distracts her during diaper changes. Worth the $10
customer_reviews.author: Amber Duke

customer_reviews.title: bought for grandson.
customer_reviews.text: bought for grandson. he loves to watch the stars as he is going to sleep it distracts him from the fact that he is going to bed and he looks forward to it now
customer_reviews.author: Terry L Wertz

customer_reviews.title: Cloud B Twinkles
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful, fun, easily portable night light. It was recommended to me by a patient's wife, who said that it put out enough light to be very comforting in a strange or new place, and it does. The stars look great, and being able to change the color is terrific, too.
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Gathright

customer_reviews.title: Works well and month's later
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for month's and it still works great. My 5 year old and 8 month old both love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nightlight.
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as I thought it would be. My grandson loves it. I ordered it one day and the next it was here. That is service.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Haase

customer_reviews.title: We got bought one for our 10 month old son ...
customer_reviews.text: We got bought one for our 10 month old son, and it's very cute. As long as you have it on a table or something it lights up the room fairly well. It seems to distract him, when he decides to wake up in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: cloud b
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these for baby gifts. I kept one to keep at Grandma's house. Cute. and Shipping was fast. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Love this nightlight
customer_reviews.text: Love this nightlight. It is safe to have around the child while sleeping and there are no wires, so no need for concern with cords or it being pulled off of a stand or table.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My child lives this. Can choose between green or blue light and will shine starts and moons on your ceiling. Has a timer to shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Monica A. Sanchez Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Keeps baby amused. I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because I think it is pricey for what it is, but I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Nice nightlight. I like the color options
customer_reviews.text: Nice nightlight. I like the color options, and the auto off feature. Light is soft enough to fall asleep, not overly bright.
customer_reviews.author: shalb

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 3 year old. She adores ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old. She adores it. Red, blue, and green colors. Bright and pleasing to the eye. Casts small fish and stars all over. Came with batteries ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift item for my niece. Nightlight provides enough lighting for my niece while she sleeps and the different colors were nice when projecting the shapes of starts.
customer_reviews.author: Romeo Was Here

customer_reviews.title: we Have already replaced the batteries and now the light won't stay on or rotate through the colors like it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: After using it for a month, we Have already replaced the batteries and now the light won't stay on or rotate through the colors like it is supposed to. Rather it flashes on and off for 5 minutes and then stops working.
customer_reviews.author: coldfossil

product_meta.title: Cloud bTwinkles to go Octo Nightlight
product_meta.description:
Compact Twilight solution that transforms any room into a starry night sky to help comfort children to sleep.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Compact Twilight solution that transforms any room into a starry night sky to help comfort children to sleep.
feature_bullets: 45 minute auto shut off ensures complete darkness during child's deep sleep, recommended by pediatricians
Projects stars and fish with bubbles
Note : Press the button twice to change color setting and also has a auto shut-off feature which turns Octo off, helping to conserve battery life

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars91 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
